channel.title: Oblivion-PK Where Noobs Become Masters! [Project insanity]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://www.server-list.org/check/check2.php?s=oblivionpkv6.no-ip.org&p=43594[/img] [CENTER][IMG]http://s11.postimg.org/k28yk26k3/logo.png[/img][/CENTER] Credits to Brent and Sanity!
To Support oblivionPk
[SPOIL][URL=http://"oblivion-pk.com"]Sponser OBPK[IMG]http://s9.postimg.org/a14g1msq7/SUPPORT_LOGO_OBPK.png[/img][/URL] I would highly appreciate it if you add this support banner to your signature! If you do, remember to remove the underscores from the code that are highlighted lime-green!
[CODE][URL="oblivion-pk.com"][IMG]http://s9.postimg.org/a14g1msq7/SUPPORT_LOGO_OBPK.png[/IMG[COLOR="#00FF00"]_[/COLOR]][/URL[COLOR="#00FF00"]_[/COLOR]][/CODE]
Copy that link paste in signature Thank you![/SPOIL]
Forums:
[url=http://www.oblivion-pk.com]Oblivion Pk Forums[/url]
[B][U][I][SIZE=6]New Client it's Jarred![/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]
[URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/pplm8kk9yit0i6z/OblivionPKOb.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAFnyLFfR1MGX0PIZrrcOr3MLCzgdXXpoQ0Tq8ReuGdtoQ"]OblivionPK V6 jar Client[/URL]
[B][U][I][SIZE=6][COLOR="#00FF00"]added: ::hpon x10 hitpoints ::hpoff ::hitmarkson ::hitmarksoff :: damage :: damageoff[/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]
very stable server!
[B][U][I][SIZE=6][FONT=Arial Black][COLOR="#FF0000"]Client Work's now guy's sorry for the inconvenience plus home has been changed to Edgeville and The boat is a bosses place due to me adding 3 custom bosses! there will be guides on the wiki! Thank you! - Mr ryan [/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]
Hey Guy's Guess what? what man? [B][U][I][COLOR="#00FF00"]OblivionPK [/COLOR][/I][/U][/B]is back up online with a new ownership
:o really?
yeah we have: [COLOR="#00FF00"][SIZE=6][I][U][B][FONT=Georgia]perfect switching, Godwars Bosses Soon to be at godwars, Dragon claws, Armadyl God'Sword, Whip, perfect Hybriding like normal, good skilling with random event, neat money not so easy not so hard, Perfect Combat stances Perfect hits GameFrames nice!, [/FONT][/B][/U][/I][/SIZE][/COLOR] What The gameframe's nice? did you say?
i sure did! ------------------------------------------------------------
the running only has unlimited% run
new special bar
why should you join oblivionpk?
OBPK is were People go when runescape went shit
And also
we have brilliant combat
This is a *PVM?SKILLING/PKING* Server
we have double exp weekends; ONLY FOR COMBATSKILLS!!
and donators get quadruple the times experience with a ring ! and on double exp it doubles it!!
BOSSES MINIGAMES! SKILLING/DELETED FARMING DUE TO BORING HABITAT!
BARROWS KILL NPC'S FOR BARROWS ITEMS!
NEW ADVANCED DROP SYSTEM! FOR OBPK
--------------------------------------------------------------
PKING TELEPORTS
MINIGAME TELEPORTS
MONSTER TELEPORTS
SKILLING TELEPORTS
JOIN TODAY DON'T WAIT ANOTHER DAY!
WHY NOT JOIN?
YOU CAN DONATE ASWELL
BUT NOT MANY BENEFITS
SO DONATE TO KEEP SERVER ONLINE *IF YOU WANT TO!*
the benefits for donator
-------------------------------------------------------------- :: DICE
::YELL
Donator Yell in game
Donator Home with extras
There will be donatorShop for rares to buy for normal prices! so you dont have to Buy of players and wait for erm to sell to you!
Enjoy OblivionPK V6
-------------------------------------------------------------
[B][U][I][SIZE=6][COLOR="#FF0000"]Credits:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]
Mr Brent/Sanity Thanks For your times of letting us play OBPK V2 and V1
Gave me idea for the future *Now* to release v6! :) Thanks Brent/Sanity
good pals! -------------------------------------------------------------
[B][U][I][COLOR="#00FF00"]ScreenShots:[/COLOR][/I][/U][/B]
[IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/bsteuqdpt/Screenshot_20_04_2014_09_22_24.png[/img] [B][SIZE=7][COLOR="#00FF00"]Easy mode Medium mode Hard mode Extreme mode[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://s17.postimg.org/odmcvy68f/Screenshot_17_04_2014_01_54_38.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s24.postimg.org/oazt6c96t/Screenshot_20_04_2014_09_21_42.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s28.postimg.org/6gnkzczr1/Screenshot_17_04_2014_01_56_02.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s9.postimg.org/4ghedhfqn/Screenshot_17_04_2014_01_56_17.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s27.postimg.org/m1xyt6zpf/Screenshot_17_04_2014_01_56_31.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s28.postimg.org/aypvrgfst/Screenshot_17_04_2014_01_56_44.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s30.postimg.org/d22yvx9v5/Screenshot_17_04_2014_01_56_57.png[/img]

item.description:
@insinity wrote:


[CENTER][/CENTER]
Credits to Brent and Sanity!

To Support oblivionPk

I would highly appreciate it if you add this support banner to your signature!
If you do, remember to remove the underscores from the code that are highlighted lime-green!

Copy that link paste in signature Thank you![/SPOIL]

Forums:

Oblivion Pk Forums

[B][U][I][SIZE=6]New Client it’s Jarred![/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]

[URL=http://“https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/pplm8kk9yit0i6z/OblivionPKOb.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAFnyLFfR1MGX0PIZrrcOr3MLCzgdXXpoQ0Tq8ReuGdtoQ”]OblivionPK V6 jar Client[/URL]

::hitmarkson ::hitmarksoff
:: damage :: damageoff[/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]

very stable server!

[B][U][I][SIZE=6][FONT=Arial Black][COLOR="#FF0000"]Client Work’s now guy’s sorry for the inconvenience plus home has been changed to Edgeville and The boat is a bosses place due to me adding 3 custom bosses! there will be guides on the wiki! Thank you! - Mr ryan [/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/U][/B]

Hey Guy’s Guess what?
what man?
[B][U][I][COLOR="#00FF00"]OblivionPK [/COLOR][/I][/U][/B]is back up online with a new ownership

:o really?

yeah we have:
[COLOR="#00FF00"][SIZE=6][I][U][B][FONT=Georgia]perfect switching,
Godwars Bosses Soon to be at godwars,
Dragon claws,
Armadyl God’Sword,
Whip,
perfect Hybriding like normal,
good skilling with random event,
neat money not so easy not so hard,
Perfect Combat stances
Perfect hits
GameFrames nice!,
[/FONT][/B][/U][/I][/SIZE][/COLOR]
What The gameframe’s nice? did you say?

i sure did!

the running only has unlimited% run

new special bar

why should you join oblivionpk?

OBPK is were People go when runescape went shit

And also

we have brilliant combat

This is a PVM?SKILLING/PKING Server

we have double exp weekends; ONLY FOR COMBATSKILLS!!

and donators get quadruple the times experience with a ring ! and on double exp it doubles it!!

BOSSES
MINIGAMES!
SKILLING/DELETED FARMING DUE TO BORING HABITAT!

BARROWS KILL NPC’S FOR BARROWS ITEMS!

NEW ADVANCED DROP SYSTEM! FOR OBPK

PKING TELEPORTS

MINIGAME TELEPORTS

MONSTER TELEPORTS

SKILLING TELEPORTS

JOIN TODAY DON’T WAIT ANOTHER DAY!

WHY NOT JOIN?

YOU CAN DONATE ASWELL

BUT NOT MANY BENEFITS

SO DONATE TO KEEP SERVER ONLINE IF YOU WANT TO!

the benefits for donator

:: DICE

::YELL

Donator Yell in game

Donator Home with extras

There will be donatorShop for rares to buy for normal prices! so you dont have to Buy of players and wait for erm to sell to you!

Enjoy OblivionPK V6
